mapper.select: select from PRO_BEST_DETAIL pbd where pbd.sid=#{sid}

select a.product_sid sid,a.ORDER_NUMBER orderNumber, a.pro_sku proSku,a.brand_name brandName, a.product_name productName, a."PRODUCT_SID",a."PROMOTION_PRICE" proPmtPrice,a."ORIGINAL_PRICE" proOldPrice,a."CURRENT_PRICE" proCurPrice,a."PROMOTION_BEGIN_TIME",a."PROMOTION_END_TIME",a."OFF_VALUE",a."PRO_SUM" proStock,a.shop_name shopName from (select p.product_sid, p.promotion_price, p.original_price, p.current_price, p.promotion_begin_time, p.promotion_end_time, p.off_value, si.shop_name, pl.pro_sku, pl.product_name, b.brand_name, pb.ORDER_NUMBER, sum(s.pro_sum) pro_sum, row_number() OVER(PARTITION BY p.product_sid ORDER BY p.promotion_price) rn from DANPIN_0408.pro_detail d, DANPIN_0408.pro_stock s, DANPIN_0408.pro_supply_price p,DANPIN_0408.sale_code sc,DANPIN_0408.shop_info si, DANPIN_0408.PRODUCT_LIST pl,DANPIN_0408.BRAND b,SPWG_0408.PRO_BEST_DETAIL pb where p.product_sid = d.product_sid and p.PRODUCT_SID=pb.PRODUCT_LIST_SID and PL.BRAND_SID = b."SID" and p.PRODUCT_SID=PL."SID" and d.sid = s.pro_detail_sid and d.pro_active_bit=1 and s.stock_type_sid = 0 and s.pro_sum > =0 and sc.shop_sid=si.sid and si.net_bit=1 and s.sale_code_sid = p.sale_code_sid and s.sale_code_sid = sc.sid and sc.supply_saling_bit=0 and sc.net_sale_bit=1 and pb.PAGE_LAYOUT_SID = #{pageLayoutSid} and EXISTS (select * from SPWG_0408.PRO_BEST_DETAIL pbd where pbd.PRODUCT_LIST_SID = p.product_sid and pbd.PAGE_LAYOUT_SID=#{pageLayoutSid}) group by p.product_sid, p.promotion_price, p.original_price, p.current_price, p.promotion_begin_time, p.promotion_end_time, si.shop_name, pl.pro_sku, pl.product_name, b.brand_name, pb.ORDER_NUMBER, p.off_value ORDER BY PB.ORDER_NUMBER ASC ) a where rn = 1
mapper.delete: delete from PRO_BEST_DETAIL pbd where pbd.product_list_sid= #{productListSid} and pbd.page_layout_sid = #{pageLayoutSid}
